DiscrepancyNoteAction.Message: Date of Informed Consent does not match Date of Informed Consent provided on Demographics and/or the Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria form. Please verify your response.

RuleDef.Name: Verification IC: Verify DT Inf Cons. with Demographics and Inc/Ex form
RuleDef.Description: Date of Informed Consent should match Date of Informed Consent on Demographics form.
